column4: hi, a minute ago when i click update manager, it gives me the xserver-xorg-video-ati and xserver-xorg-video-intel
i dont have ati or intel video card
do i need to update them?
Thats normal, they aer included by default.  If you have limited bandwidth you don't need to upgrade them.
they are only about 400KB i guess i can live with that
how come there are always update from awn??
Are you sure you aren't using a third party repository for that?
i am using third party repos for that
Then you'd have to ask whomever is providing that repo then.
they are in third party software
